bio: Played at the University of Georgia in 1982 and 1983, earning All-America honors both years and capturing the 1983 NCAA Doubles title (w/A. Miller). Graduated from UNLV with a bachelor's degree in Physical Education. Was the women's tennis coach at UNLV from 1993 to 1998 as well as the personal coach of Mikael Pernfors, Chandra Rubin and Katarina Lindqvist. Has been a National Coach for the USTA Player Development program since 2003.
